definition: to lean/to slant/oblique/prejudiced/to deviate from average/to stray from the intended line/stubbornly/contrary to expectations
to shake/to flap/to vibrate/to resonate/to rise up with spirit/to rouse oneself

sentences.english: In other words polarization properties are excluded.
sentences.chinese: 換句話說，偏振性質未包括在內。

sentences.english: This ability is described by polarization crosstalk or polarization-holding parameter.
sentences.chinese: 這種能力用偏振串話或偏振保持參數來描述。

sentences.english: This ability is described by polarization crosstalk or polarization-holding parameter.
sentences.chinese: 這種能力用偏振串話或偏振保持參數來描述。

sentences.english: Based on the Y-shaped cavity frequency splitting method, an orthogonal polarized He-Ne laser has been designed and implemented.
sentences.chinese: 研製了基於Y型腔結構的新型正交偏振氦氖激光器。

sentences.english: The polarizing beam coupling and splitting technology for LGS is the main part of this study.
sentences.chinese: 重點研究了用於激光導星的偏振耦合分光技術。

sentences.english: The photoinduced permanent polarization of bacteriorhodopsin was experimentally investigated.
sentences.chinese: 實驗摸索了菌紫質激光誘導永久偏振態的產生條件。

sentences.english: Optical flux is an important parameter of polarization interference spectrometer.
sentences.chinese: 光通量是偏振干涉成像光譜儀的關鍵參量之一。

sentences.english: Polarization of shear-wave is analysed by using particle motion diagram.
sentences.chinese: 用質點運動圖的方法對橫波的偏振進行了分析。

sentences.english: To cause beating by superposing waves of different frequencies.
sentences.chinese: 使光波分裂成兩束平行的垂直偏振的波。

sentences.english: In this paper, we present a new polarization coupler using high-birefringence-fiber.
sentences.chinese: 報道一種新穎的高雙折射光纖偏振耦合器。

sentences.english: About the wavelength selectivity, the changing trends for different polarizations are in an opposite way.
sentences.chinese: 而對於波長響應，兩種偏振態表現出不同的變化趨勢。

sentences.english: It enables exact calculation of distance and can perceive ultra-violet and polarized light.
sentences.chinese: 它能夠精確計算距離並且能夠感受紫外線和偏振光。

sentences.english: Recent research shows that many fish sense polarized light.
sentences.chinese: 最近的研究顯示，許多魚類能感應到偏振光。

sentences.english: A new structure of polarized light interference interleaver is presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一種偏振光干涉型光交錯複用器的新結構。

sentences.english: The measuring condition for principle angle in spectroscopic ellipsometry is analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 對橢圓偏振光譜中的主角測量條件進行了分析。

sentences.english: Rotation spectrum of quartz in the orthogonal polarization road is experimentally studied.
sentences.chinese: 對正交偏振光路中石英旋光光譜現象進行了實驗研究。
